'''Fireworks Atop a Meka''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] in that takes place in [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]], [[Fontaine]].

==Steps==
# Collect two [[Spur Gear C]]'s and one [[Spur Gear T]]
#: [[File:HEO Location Fireworks Atop a Meka.png|300px]]
# Assemble the Spur Gears at the top of the large meka, this will spawn some unlit fireworks
# Light the fireworks with any {{Pyro}} attack
# Get down from the mechanism and watch the fireworks

==Gameplay Notes==
* Completing this Hidden Exploration Objective awards a [[Luxurious Chest]] and the {{Achievement|Undocumented Feature}}.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(After submitting the Spur Gears and lighting the fireworks)
